name: Shroomies
description:
Shroomies!!! A floral themed bullet hell in which you play as a grumpy mushroom blasting it's way through waves of flowers. Dodge swiftly, pickup power-ups and mash (or hold) that fire button to survive the botanic barrage!!!

Can you make it past 6 waves and see what menace awaits you at the end???

...no? ...you can't??

Well good!!! With every death comes progress! After your defeat, the next generation will pick up the legacy of the previous one's. Fallen mushrooms are reborn in the form of Shroomies: little helpers that provide auxiliary fire and increase the amount of hits you can take before dying. With each attempt build up your community and upgrade them using the mulch points you accumulate, giving the generation of shrooms a better fighting chance!

CONTROLS :

  • Move around with WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Shoot with Space or Left Click
  • Controllers also supported!

CREDITS :

  • Anthony Melendez - Level Designer, Narrative Designer
  • John Zhou - Programmer
  • Tomasz Wiercioch - Artist, Character Designer
  • Michael Feliciano - Composer

Game originally made for the Black and White Jam #0.(9)
